description:
After completing my studies I had to find a job in a very competitive market. I had to find a way to stand out of the crowd and decided to build a website to promote myself in a professional way. With this I had a tool to market myself when contacting relations and future employees. In the end I scored many interviews and got a job in 4 days when I arrived in Singapore.

It’s easy to do, and I want to help you.

The result

A well designed website that promotes you and helps you in your next step of your career.

This course is different

In this course I will teach you the very basics web programming and edit images. There will be some basic coding involved. But don’t be scared I will take you step by step. I will provide you with a template to put your own text and images in so you can create your personalised website.

Disclaimer

This course will include programming to create your website. It will not use a website builder platform where you drag/drop your images and text. Even without experience you will get the hang of it quick, but it can be challenging.
title: Boost your career with your unique personal website
